tool_description: Uploads media files to storage systems and creates asset records with metadata for product catalog management.

file_path.description: Local path to the media file to upload

product_id.description: Product identifier to associate with this asset

asset_type.description: Type of asset: image, video, document, or audio

primary_asset.description: Whether this is the primary asset for the product

error_messages: File not found: The specified file_path does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid asset type: asset_type must be one of [image, video, document, audio].
Product ID not found: The specified product_id does not exist in the catalog.
Upload failed: File could not be uploaded due to storage system error - check file size and format.
usage: Provide the local file path, associated product ID, and asset type. Set primary_asset to true if this should be the main product image.

asset_id.description: Unique identifier for the uploaded asset

storage_url.description: URL where the asset is stored

file_size.description: Size of uploaded file in bytes

upload_timestamp.description: When the upload completed in ISO 8601 format
